Returns: the next element in the iteration
next().Description: Returns the next element in the iteration.

Returns: the next int element in the iteration
Throws: if the iteration has no more elements
nextInt().Description: Returns the next int element in the iteration.

forEachRemaining(java.util.function.Cons.FullName: public void forEachRemaining (Consumer<? super Integer> action)

Parameters: IntConsumer: The action to be performed for each element
Throws: if the specified action is null
forEachRemaining(java.util.function.IntC.Description: Performs the given action for each remaining element until all elements have been processed or the action throws an exception. Actions are performed in the order of iteration, if that order is specified. Exceptions thrown by the action are relayed to the caller.

ClassDesc: An Iterator specialized for int values.
